turkish_example_sentence: Sen o güzel çiçeği alsan annene verirdin.
english_example_sentence: If you were to take that beautiful flower, you would give it to your mother.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты взял тот красивый цветок, ты бы отдал его своей маме.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen o güzel çiçeği ______ annene verirdin.
